#summary The entrance point for the user guide, listing it's chapters.
#labels Featured

= Introduction =
The following is a guide aimed towards the user-end of the epiClock, explaining it's features, how to control it, etc. All information in this guide will be front-facing. If you're looking for help understanding the back end code to edit the library and not implement it, you want the [Developer_Guide Developer Guide].

= Chapters =
  * [user_quick Quick Start] - The basics you need to know to deploy an epiClock
  * [user_advanced Advanced Guide] - The features of an epiClock
  * [user_image Image Guide] - Everything you need to know about creating your own image clock
